title: 3B/2B Home Available! Stainless Steel Appliances and One Month Free!
posting_body: At The Benton, every aspect of living has been designed to reclaim and restore.
Enjoy the unique opportunity to rent a remodeled, historic single-family home with a spacious private backyard and curated landscape.
This 3 bedroom, 2 full bathroom home features brand new double pane windows and ceiling skylights to welcome natural light.
The lighting, sounds, and materials have all been designed to help you slow down and enjoy the moment.
Considered details that make this house a home.
Wood floors throughout, brand new appliances featuring a gas stove, private parking, a full-size washer and dryer, and central A/C and heat controlled by digital thermostat.
Kick back on the front sun porch and enjoy a drink of your choosing.
Pause for reflection, and play to energize.
You’ll also have access to the full suite of amenities at The Benton Apartments, including a rooftop clubhouse with swimming pool, 24/7 fitness center, and outdoor barbecue stations.
